title: Ticket #5342: Add qsub error logging to pbs_submit
description:
Derek has written a patch so that qsub errors are captured and printed to stderr so that HTCondor can use them in its hold message.

https://github.com/osg-bosco/BLAH/pull/16/files?diff=unified
remarks:
2016-Apr-06 15:15:39 by tannenba:
Assigned to Derek, since he is merging the blahp ... we don't want to pull in blahp patches in HTCondor repo until the merge takes places else we just create more blahp merge work.

2020-Mar-18 13:31:49 by blin:
Code was merged into the OSG blahp, which is now the same as the HTCondor blahp. Resolving.
creator: blin
